article.title: Welcome to Textpattern
article.body:
This is your first post, which you can edit or delete and then start writing your own content.
If you're new here and would like a quick tour then please see "Textpattern in Two Minutes":https://textpattern.com/about/425/textpattern-in-two-minutes or "head over to the docs":https://docs.textpattern.com/ for more detailed information.
Have fun!
